sourcesContent: import lifeImage from '../../image/Life.jpeg' import EditDelete from '../icons /EditDelete' import { SinglePost, SinglePostTitle, SinglePostInfo, Span, Name, SinglePostDescription, } from './Singlepost.styled' import { PostInfo } from '../post/Post.styled' const SinglePostCard = () => { return ( <> {PostInfo.map(({ id, title, image, postDate, description }) => { ; {title} Author: Dohee Lee {postDate} {description} })} ) } export default SinglePostCard
